this_title: Secret Life of the Lighthouse Season 2
trans_title: 灯塔的秘密生活 第二季
introduction: Presenter Rob Bell explores one of Britain’s most heroic engineering achievements, the rock lighthouse, in a new three-part series that takes viewers along the country’s stunning but dangerous coastline.Rob meets the Keepers, skippers, and storytellers with tales of those who overcame seemingly insurmountable obstacles to not only build a tower on a wave-washed rock but to live and work in some of the most hostile environments on earth. These stories are told from the might of the North Atlantic to the tempestuous moods of the North Sea.S2 E1 - The Wolf RockS2 E2 - The SmallsS2 E3 - The LongstoneProduction companies: October Films, Channel 5 Television
chinese_title: 灯塔的秘密生活 第二季
foreign_title: Secret Life of the Lighthouse Season 2
